item.title: First Post
item.description: Trying another hugo static site generation template. Maybe I will actually do some blogging this time around. Who knows. I never seem to find the time though.

item.title: A Brief Bio
item.description: SECURITY. EFFICIENCY. AUTOMATION. Theres more to it than that, but my background operating in numerous capacities in tech boils down to those three things. Security and automation being areas my work has been in, as well as areas I enjoy participating in. Efficiency being a result of those efforts. I’ve worked in companies ranging from tiny seed funded startups to the worlds largest telecoms, ISP’s and media companies. I’ve been a principal level technical contributor and have often moved into leadership roles from there based on organizational need.
